1: <pb/><t>Wila' ma' re' QaJaaw Dios xyej-anik reh i paat</t> <t>xama' xta neerutiq i neenkian i aj yej-an reh.</t> <t>Eh wila' ma' re' i QaJaaw Dios incha'jinik reh i tinamit</t> <t>xama' xta rutiq i neenkian i aj cha'joom.</t>
2: <t>Eh xama' xta neerutiq reh jino'q chi neenokik q'iij chi kamanik,</t> <t>xa k'axik wo' noq nee rureq rukaxlanwi'k.</t> <t>Eh re' QaJaaw Dios ma' k'axik ta noq</t> <t>i ruyeew kikaxlanwi'k taqe i ruk'ax, i ruyeew kihi'liik.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Re' taqe i qak'uun qixq'uun ki-aasjik xa qakooch</t> <t>noq i ruyeew cho qeh i QaJaaw Dios, eh xiik' naah kiloq'il chi qeh.</t>
4: <t>Re' taqe i qak'uun qixq'uun ki-aasjik noq ko hoj ak'un,</t> <t>je' naa jinaj flecha chi qeh. Je' rukab' i ruko'leej wii' riib' i winaq kow riib'.</t>
5: <t>Atoob' reh awach i wilik k'ih-oq rak'uun rixq'uun,</t> <t>ruum ma' naa ta ruk'ixiik</t> <t>chikiwach taqe i ki-ixowanik wach,</t> <t>noq naa ruq'orob'jiik panookb'al.</t>
